author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Even though all of the dragons in Game of Thrones were computer generated creatures, the show's art department made physical dragon props for various purposes of production. From dragon eggs to puppet lighting references and wood sculptures, we check out a range of dragon props made for the original run of the series. 

Learn more about this prop and see more details at: https://propstoreauction.com/auctions/info/id/462
The hand props of House of the Dragon: https://youtu.be/NGJzsArTOKI

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join
Tested and Adam Savage Ts, stickers, (de) merit badges and more: https://tested-store.com
Savage Merchandising: https://adamsavage.com/
About Tested: https://www.tested.com/about
Meet Ada
title: The Real Dragons Made for Game of Thrones!

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
We're back in the office after a few days off, and that means it's live stream time! Adam will be taking Tested member questions with no particular theme. Note that during live streams, Tested memberships are gifted. Join us for the next live stream and be sure you're signed into your YouTube account and you've opted to receive gifted memberships! YouTube randomly assigns gifts to people logged in and watching.  Instructions are on this page (https://support.google.com/youtube/answer/6304294 -- just scroll to "opt in and get gifted memberships."
